channel.title: Intensive English Institute - Important Dates and Events
channel.description: Important dates and activities for students of the Intensive English Institute

item.title: IEI Summer Registration and Orientation
item.description: New IEI students must attend registration and orientation events from June 8th-June 12th.

item.title: IEI summer classes begin
item.description: IEI summer classes begin on June 15th. We will have classes on Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays (no classes on Wednesdays).
